name: Flat# W41-A Lotion Bar
description:
Flat# W41-A from "The Urban Casa" Collection

Our Flat #W-41A blend is fresh, clean and energizing with notes of citrus and cloves! It is an extremely versatile scent which embraces both masculine and feminine notes. It's properties of essential oils are uplifitng Citrus base with warm undertones of Mother Earth. It's addictive and sexy all cubed up and ready to explode!
 
Directions: It's like using soap, only it is a solid lotion bar you can use anytime, anywhere! Small enough to put in your back pocket, or your purse. I leave one in the guest bathroom for my guests to enjoy! No messy spills.

Recommended as an anytime moisturizer, particularly after bath. Hands, feet & elbows softener. Use daily to eliminate dry/ cracked skin. 
I also use it whenever I need a whiff of pure luxury!

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

name: Organic Liquid Hand Soap - Flat #W41-A
description:
Our Flat #W-41A blend is fresh, clean and energizing with notes of citrus and cloves! This Organic Castile Liquid Soap is an all natural, vegetable based cleansing product. Top that off with pure essential oils, and Voila! You get a classy, fresh and energizing based organic soap eager to cleanse and refresh you all at the same time!

Ingredients: Prana’s Proprietary Blend of Pure Essential Oils, 
Organic Castille Soap Base. (organic certification available upon request)

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

PURE. SIMPLE. LIFE.

Product weight is 8 oz.

name: The Versatile Wipeout - Flat #W41-A
description:
Our Flat #W-41A blend is fresh, clean and energizing with notes of citrus and cloves! Since it’s all natural, use freely! The natural, mother-nature derived anti-bacterial properties in our Versatile Wipeout make it an excellent floor cleaner, counter-top sanitizer, air-refresher, body mister, feet duster, odor annihilator, pet space rejuvenator. Your personal space will thank you for smelling fresh and clean. Always test area before full application. 
    
PURE.    SIMPLE.    LIFE.
No Parabens. No SLS. No Phthalates. No Artificial Preservatives. No Artificial Fragrances. Never Tested on Animals. Prana supports Fair Trade.

Ingredients: Prana’s Proprietary Blend of Pure Essential Oils, 
Distilled water & Grain Alcohol.

name: Automobile Spray - Flat #W-41A
description:
Our Flat #W-41A blend embraces an energizing Citrus Base with notes of & Eucalyptus & Cloves. Since it’s all natural, use freely, even on yourself! 100% pure natural car freshener that will crisp up your car in a quick minute, and has a tendency to linger unashamedly! Your personal space will thank you for smelling crispy clean. 

Always test area before full application. 
    
Ingredients: Prana’s Proprietary Blend of Pure Essential Oils, 
Distilled water & Grain Alcohol.

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

PURE.    SIMPLE.    LIFE.

Product weight is 2.75 oz.

name: Soy Massage Oil Candle with Essential Oils - Flat #W41-A
description:
Prana’s Luxurious Soy Massage Oil Candles are infused with pure Essential Oils, which flirtatiously turn from aromatherapy candles to massage oils when lit. Due to soy’s low melting point, temperature of soy wax is only approximately 2 degrees above your body temperature, making it ingeniously safe to pour directly onto your skin and massage. Always test area for temperature resistance.

Candle burns for approximately 26 hours! Unused candle will reharden for reuse. Our Soy Massage Oil Candles can be re-lit over and over again ’till it finishes. 

Our Soy Massage Oil Candles have delightful aromatherapy qualities that are luxurious, stimulating, energetic, and mood boosting. Relax and take some time for yourself.

name: Therapeutic Massage & Body Oils - Flat #W41-A
description:
Our Flat #W-41A blend is fresh, clean and energizing with notes of citrus and cloves! 

Immerse yourself in this luxurious, synergistic proprietary blend of Pure Essential Oils, Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E and Evening Primrose. Allow your entire being to be moisturized while scenting your skin with the natural moisturizing benefits of nothing short of pure Essential Oils. 

Our Therapeutic Massage & Body Oil is aromatic, non-oily, and can be used daily as you would use body lotion. As a matter of fact, I have been using it for 2 years, as has my sister, brother-in-law, mother and father. My father, Hera Singh,  inspired this moisturizing body oil. I still remember being a child and my father’s love for body oils, and bath oils, which he still enjoys!

Your Therapeutic Massage & Body Oil comes in a perfect sized bottle of 2oz spray bottle for convenient use.

Packaging is a recycled 4x4 box with hand dyed silk ribbon and a homemade wax seal with our company logo - a lotus leaf opening upwards towards the universe, and a symbolic lotus bud.

The bottle is wrapped in recycled tissue and nestles in recycled kraft shredded paper embellishment inside.  

PURE. SIMPLE. LIFE.

No SLS. No Parabens. No Phthalates. No Artificial Preservatives. 
No Artificial Fragrance. No Animal Testing.

name: Therapeutic Massage & Body Oils - Misty Mint
description:
Peppermint dominates this scent and our specially created Proprietary Blend of Misty Mint is added to inject a vibrant, penetrating minty scent to remind us of wintry freshness.

This blend has strong minty notes with herbaceous warm undertones releasing both warm and cool aromas all at once!

PURE. SIMPLE. LIFE.

name: Therapeutic Massage & Body Oils - Lavender Heights
description:
Prana’s Fruit & Floral Collection is heavenly inspired by nature….Lavender to be exact. We specially picked a certain variety of Lavender essential oils for this blend for its sweet, floral note, and its rich lavender-floral scent which is somewhat fruitier, and mellower.

Also accompanying Lavender in this blend is an all time favorite Vanilla, making our Lavender Heights blend a truly melting, and surrendering-to-true-luxury experience you will want to recreate over and over again.

Immerse yourself in this luxurious, synergistic proprietary blend of Pure Essential Oils, Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E and Evening Primrose. name: Cognac Lotion Bar
description:
Cognac from "The Gentleman's Club" Collection

This is all the manly man smell that perks you up and makes you feel fresh and clean! Our Cognac Blend has a fresh, vibrant fruit tone serenading  in a slight green, herbaceous note.Our Steam Distilled Cognac essential oil, specially picked by Prana, has a rich aroma reminiscent of an old wine barrel.

This is not a scent to be taken for granted. It has the royalty stamp of the pure essence of Cognac essential oils derived from the same ballsy grapes used to produce Cognac (Brandy). To balance the ying and yang, we introduce another scent - the sensual pure Cocoa Essential oil. Then, to top it off, we sweep in some pure sweet, herbaceous Lemongrass. Simply bold and sexy!

Directions: It's like using soap, only it is a solid lotion bar you can use anytime, anywhere! Small enough to put in your back pocket, or your purse. I leave one in the guest bathroom for my guests to enjoy! No messy spills.

Recommended as an anytime moisturizer, particularly after bath. Hands, feet & elbows softener. Use daily to eliminate dry/ cracked skin. 
I also use it whenever I need a whiff of pure luxury!

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

name: Coffee Lotion Bar
description:
Coffee from "The Gentleman's Club" Collection

This is one very lucky, luxuriously silky bar. The Coffee Essential Oil smells just like a fresh brewed pot of coffee, and together with our proprietary spice blend, it releases the juices of coffee beans. Ironically decadent! It is both warming and invigorating. You almost want to take a bite into it. The smell alone has sufficed on many occasions.

Directions: It's like using soap, only it is a solid lotion bar you can use anytime, anywhere! Small enough to put in your back pocket, or your purse. I leave one in the guest bathroom for my guests to enjoy! No messy spills.

Recommended as an anytime moisturizer, particularly after bath. Hands, feet & elbows softener. Use daily to eliminate dry/ cracked skin. I also use it whenever I need a whiff of pure luxury!

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

description:
Coco Vanilla from "The Ladies' Suite" Collection

This blend is made with essential oils of pure Cocoa - the dark side of passion, pure Vanilla - the sweet, innocent side of peace, splashed with uplifting notes of Sweet Dark Orange when you least expect it. The Women love this for it's Luxurious ingredients!

name: Misty Mint Lotion Bar
description:
Misty Mint from "The Holiday Collection"

What we have here is a mental stimulant and energizing, refreshing scent enough to wake your hands and mind up!
I use this bar particularly in the middle of the day when I am getting lethargic and siestas are whaling out my name!

Peppermint dominates this scent and our specially created Proprietary Blend of Misty Mint is added to inject a vibrant, penetrating minty scent to remind us of wintery freshness.

This blend has strong minty notes with herbaceous warm undertones releasing both warm and cool aromas all at once!

Directions: It's like using soap, only it is a solid lotion bar you can use anytime, anywhere! Small enough to put in your back pocket, or your purse. I leave one in the guest bathroom for my guests to enjoy! No messy spills.

Recommended as an anytime moisturizer, particularly after bath. Hands, feet & elbows softener. Use daily to eliminate dry/ cracked skin. Excellent for massages. I also use it whenever I need a whiff of pure luxury!

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

name: Steel Grass Lotion Bar
description:
Steel Grass from "The Sports Collection"

This is all the ginger grassy smell that rushes your adrenaline to make those touchdowns! Our Steel Grass Blend has a fresh, vibrant, gingery and uplifting tones which balances with the aggressive, steel, cool scent of peppermint. This perfect balance is actually our customers favorite! It refreshes and energizes any and every room...and yes, including the bathroom!  

Directions: It's like using soap, only it is a solid lotion bar you can use anytime, anywhere! Small enough to put in your back pocket, or your purse. I leave one in the guest bathroom for my guests to enjoy! No messy spills.

Recommended as an anytime moisturizer, particularly after bath. Hands, feet & elbows softener. Use daily to eliminate dry/ cracked skin. Excellent for massages. I also use it whenever I need a whiff of pure luxury!

NO PARABENS. NO SLS. NO PHTHALATES. NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES. NO ARTIFICIAL FRAGRANCES. NO ANIMAL TESTING. SUPPORTS FAIR TRADE WHENEVER POSSIBLE.

name: Lavender Heights Summer Spray
description:
Prana's Nature Inspired Line - "The Fruit & Floral Collection” 
Room Atomizer & Body Spray

Summer Sprays are Room Atomizers as well as Body Sprays made out of pure essential oils, distilled water and  some grain alcohol. These sprays are so natural and safe that you can spray the room, and then walk into the mist to freshen up at the same time! 

Prana’s Fruit & Floral Collection is inspired by heavenly nature….Lavender to be exact. 

We specially picked a certain variety of Lavender essential oils for this blend for its sweet, floral note, and its rich lavender-floral scent which is somewhat fruitier, and mellower. 

Also accompanying Lavender in this blend is an all time favorite Vanilla, making our Lavender Heights blend a truly melting luxurious experience you will want to recreate over and over again.

What's In It? Luxurious Necessities!

name: Misty Mint Summer Spray
description:
Introducing Prana's Holiday Line - "The Holiday Collection” 
Room Atomizer & Body Spray

Summer Sprays are Room Atomizers as well as Body Sprays made out of pure essential oils, distilled water and  some grain alcohol. These sprays are so natural and safe that you can spray the room, and then walk into the mist to freshen up at the same time!

Misty Mint 
What we have here is a mental stimulant and energizing, refreshing scent enough to knock out any odor! I keep this religiously near my cat, Gingerella’s Litter Box. 

Peppermint dominates this scent, and together with our proprietary Blend of Misty Mint which is added to inject a vibrant, penetrating minty scent. All this just to remind us of wintery freshness. 

Our Misty Mint Blend has strong minty notes with herbaceous warm undertones, releasing both warm, and cool aromas all at once!  

What's In It? Luxurious Necessities!

name: Steel Grass Summer Spray
description:
Introducing Prana's Sport's Line - "Steel Grass” 
Room Atomizer & Body Spray

Summer Sprays are Room Atomizers as well as Body Sprays made out of pure essential oils, distilled water and  some grain alcohol. These sprays are so natural and safe that you can spray the room, and then walk into the mist to freshen up at the same time!

Steel Grass
This is all the ginger grassy smell that rushes your adrenaline to make those touchdowns! Our Steel Grass Blend has a fresh &  vibrant, gingery & uplifting tones, which balances with the aggressive, steel, cool scent of peppermint. This perfect balance is actually our customers favorite! It refreshes and energizes any and every room...and yes, including the bathroom!

name: Cognac Summer Spray
description:
Introducing Prana's Men's Line - "The Gentleman's Club” 
Room Atomizer & Body Spray

Summer Sprays are Room Atomizers as well as Body Sprays made out of pure essential oils, distilled water and  some grain alcohol. PURE. SIMPLE. LIFE. These sprays are so natural and safe that you can spray the room, and then walk into the mist to freshen up at the same time!

This is not a scent to be taken for granted. It has the royalty stamp of the pure essence of Cognac essential oils derived from the same ballsy grapes used to produce Cognac (Brandy). To balance the ying and yang, we introduce the sensually pure Cocoa Essential oil. To top it off, we sweep in some pure sweet, herbaceous Lemongrass, as well as our proprietary blend of a couple more essential oils.

This is all the manly man smell that perks you up and makes you feel fresh and clean! Our Cognac Blend has a fresh, vibrant fruit tone serenading  in a slight green, herbaceous note. Our Steam Distilled Cognac essential oil, specially picked by Prana, has a rich aroma reminiscent of an old wine barrel.

Simply bold and sexy!

name: Coco Vanilla Summer Spray
description:
Introducing Prana's Lady's Line - "The Ladies' Suite” 
Room Atomizer & Body Spray

Summer Sprays are Room Atomizers as well as Body Sprays made out of pure essential oils, distilled water and  some grain alcohol. These sprays are so natural and safe that you can spray the room, and then walk into the mist to freshen up at the same time!

Our Ladies' Suite Collection is sensually maxed to the passive-aggressive side of sexiness. The sultry packaging of lace and fur slathers sensuality. The back of the box has a sexy little "tail" sticking out teasingly.  

This blend is made with essential oils of pure Cocoa - the dark side of passion, pure Vanilla - the sweet, innocent side of peace, splashed with uplifting notes of Sweet Dark Orange when you least expect it. The Women love this for it's Luxurious ingredients and sexy packaging. 

What's In It? Luxurious Necessities!

name: Lavender Nasal Inhaler
description:
ESSENTIAL OIL NASAL INHALERS
2  great selling blends of Pure Essential Oils to help you relax and decongest. The blends are “Lavender” & “Peppermint”. 

Our delightful blend of Lavender and Peppermint are both quite popular within our own families. My mom personally loves to use the Lavender blend before she goes to sleep. I have had to mail a few to her in Singapore. I use Peppermint quite often when my allergies flare up. It decongests me, and picks me up at the same time! Our Nasal Inhalers lasts a long time. 

The packaging is a little book that houses our nasal inhaler. A piece of printed translucent vellum adorns the “book” making it a half book cover. They truly are a piece of artwork all by itself. You’ll have to truly have to check it out for yourself!
